The aim study evaluate efficacy low protein diet α-keto acid tablet retard progress CKD . This randomized , open-label , prospective study , 120 patient meet inclusion exclusion criterion randomize three group ratio 1:1:1 . Group I patient receive low protein diet ( 0.6g/kg BW ) , group II receive low protein diet supplement α-keto acid , group III take low protein diet ( 0.3g/kg BW ) supplement α-keto acid . The change glomerular filtration rate CKD evaluate 1 year treatment .
